trans-unit.source: Contains properties that you can use to query system settings.
trans-unit.target: 包含可用来查询系统设置的属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the border multiplier factor that determines the width of a window's sizing border.
trans-unit.target: 获取边框倍数因子，确定窗口大小调整边框的宽度。

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemParameters.Border`}`"/>
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 属性用法*对象属性*="{SystemParameters.Border`}`"/&1;>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.Border*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the border width of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 获取规格，它确定非最小化窗口的非工作区的边框宽度。

trans-unit.source: The metric is obtained from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS.
trans-unit.target: 从 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 获得该度量值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.BorderWidth*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption height for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 获取规格，它确定非最小化窗口的非工作区的标题高度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.CaptionHeight*> property.
Gets the metric that determines the caption width for the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.
trans-unit.target: 获取规格，它确定非最小化窗口的非工作区的标题宽度。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.ResourceKey"></xref> for the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.CaptionWidth*> property.
Gets the caret width, in pixels, for edit controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取插入符号宽度，以像素为单位，编辑控件。

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user requires an application to present information visually where it typically presents the information only in audible form; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
